page.title: 14SHELTERED HOUSING
page.content: YESTERDAY I WENT TO{PEMBROKE COURT WITH MRS SAMPSON AND WAYNE. WHEN WE GOT THERE,THERE WAS A LADY CALLED MRS ARMSTRONG SHE SHOWED US A{FLAT,}THERE WAS A KITCHEN ,A BATHROOM, SITTING ROOM AND A BEDROOM AFTER THAT WE WENT INTO THE{COMMON ROOM}WHERE THERE WAS A KITCHEN AND TABLES AND CHAIRS.SOON AFTER THAT WE WENT TO THE LAUNDRY THERE WAS A WASHER TUMBLEDRYER AND A SPINNER .THE COMMAN ROOM IS DIFFERENT BECAUSE IT IS FOR ALL THE PEOPLE LIVING THERE.WE ASK SOME QUESTIONS WHERE DO YOU GET YOUR FOOD FROM? GO SHOPPING OR GET YOUR{HOME HELP}TO DO IT FOR YOU. WHAT IS IT LIKE LIVING HERE? NICE. ARE THE PEOPLE KIND TO YOU ? YES. WHO LOOKS AFTER YOU WHEN YOU ARE ILL? THE WARDEN WILL CALL THE DOCTOR AND YOUR FAMILY FOR YOU. DO YOU PREFER LVING HERE ? YES.
